sentence.Network_en: He proposed fixing up a leanto as protection for all the comrades here.
sentence.Network_cn: 他建议,挨着墙搭一个棚子,供这儿所有同志遮风挡雨.

entry.tran: （依附于大建筑物的）披屋，披棚，单坡屋顶小房
entry.def: A lean-to is a building such as a shed or garage which is attached to one wall of a larger building, and which usually has a sloping roof.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
